TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: Tang & F. T. Wang ex L. K. Dai

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 无喙绿穗薹草 wu hui lü sui tai cao

place_of_publication.publication_title: in L. K. Dai & S. Yun Liang, Fl. Reipubl. Popularis Sin.

treatment.description: Spikes approximate. Utricles subelliptic, 2–2.5 mm, nearly beakless. Fl. and fr. Jul–Aug.
treatment.distribution: ● Grasslands or wet places in ravines; ca. 2000 m. NE Qinghai (Datong).
treatment.discussion: This name was not validly published by L. K. Dai in 2000 because the herbarium in which the type is conserved was not specified (Vienna Code, Art. 37.7). For the same reason, it was not validated by S. Y. Jin and Y. L. Chen (Cat. Type Spec. Herb. China (Suppl. II), 75. 2007).
